TITLE Tofu Baisl Pesto Pasta

# In a food processor combine [1 cup silken tofu], [2 tbl olive oil], [1 cloves garlic], [1 cup basil], [1/2 tsp black pepper], [4 oz [grated] parmigiano], [2 tbl lemon juice], [1/4 tsp salt]. Process until smooth.
# Cook [2 cup penne pasta]
# While the pasta cooks saute [1/4 cup [minced] shallot].
# Add the pesto to the pan with the shallots until warmed through.
